review: I have 2. Neither is working. All other devices are working fine.
author: BJ

review: Absolutely blown away by how much power this little stick has. Everything loads on it extremely fast. It is more geared toward Amazon content, but being an Amazon product it is expected. Didn't have internet connection issues that others have spoke of.  Everything for me has been great.
author: Ladarian

review: does everything it promises best thing since sliced bread coodos.
author: michael padurjan

review: Still trying to figure it out, but spare time & need haven't hit at the same time.  Figure it will be FANtastic when I get time & understand ALL it can do.
author: larry e miller

review: Wonderful!  Should have dumped Comcast sooner!!!!
author: Sue Sanders

review: Worked for a month very well. After 5 weeks stopped working. I tried it on a different TV and I also tried all the tricks and the tips to turn it on. Wanted to return but this item is no longer eligible for return. The return window closed on Jul 20, 2015.
author: TDumitriu

review: tried the amazon, and still prefer my old roku... Wish i would have paid more for the one with ethernet but the $100 price point doesn't see worth it anymore.
author: Chad B.

review: Works as promised. But I have to say the box version works faster.
author: Alex G Salinas

review: Works great! Wish it had ability to hook up Bluetooth speakers
author: ashley m levy

review: The fire stick is awesome!  There are tons of movies and t.v. shows to choose from and the resolution is great. Best $24 I ever spent.
author: jeff Bryant
